p: The extraction of carbohydrates and organic acids was performed according to Denev et al. with some modifications [ 39]. Briefly, one gram of the M. frivaldszkyana powder was weighted accurately and extracted for 1 h, at 30 °C with 30 mL distilled water and shaking on a thermostatic water bath (NUVE, Ankara, Turkey). After that, the samples were filtered and centrifuged (6000× g, 20 min) and the supernatants were used for HPLC analysis of sugars and organic acids [ 39].
